website_summaries.verdict: Competitively priced and stocked with respectable hardware specs, the LG Optimus F6 is a worthy buy for prepaid customers who are big on value.
pros: The LG Optimus F6 has clear call quality, a decent 5-megapixel shooter, and a bright, responsive screen
cons: 4G LTE data speeds were erratic at times on T-Mobile, and because the handset's equipped with Android 4.1.2, it runs a slightly dated OS

customer_reviews.title: LG
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Had the same one previously but I dropped it and it broke. With this one I bought an extra sturdy case. I bought it originally because I'm hearing impaired and it has T3M3 capability so I'm able to hear a little bit better than on a regular phone plus I like the green blinking light to let me know I have a message, since I don't always hear the phone beep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did buy more memory for her but the phone is really nice. It was affordable too
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone for my mom who is in her 60s. She absolutely loves it. She is finally able to fb video chat with her grand kids. I did buy more memory for her but the phone is really nice. It was affordable too. Great pics and all the bells and whistles as the more expensive smartphones. I might get one for my sister too. Very nice phone at a very fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: locked to Metro Pcs !
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a T mobile phone! The phone i received was a Metro Pcs phone.. which i understand actually runs on the tmobile network, however my tmobile sim would not work until i unlocked the phone by having to purchase an unlock code. Other than that it's a great phone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Really great phone, came within 3 days of ordering it
customer_reviews.text: Really great phone, came within 3 days of ordering it. It came brand new in, the box with factory packaging plenty of memory space decent size screen, and nice crisp response when using
customer_reviews.author: USMCninja

customer_reviews.title: Great battery but cannot have apps
customer_reviews.text: There is little to no internal storage and there are only so many apps that allow you to save directly to a microSD card
customer_reviews.author: Jade P. Irving

customer_reviews.title: brand New with original box came quick
customer_reviews.text: Came BRAND NEW I had the same phone, just switched over SIM card. Works Great! With these phones i highly suggest a SD card, the internal memory small.
customer_reviews.author: brook virginski

customer_reviews.title: It really should be advertised as 2GB
customer_reviews.text: Yeah the internal storage is a huge problem. Unless you root it, the phone is pretty much useless. And the speaker is pretty bad too. But other than that everything is fantastic, especially the battery life. If you can deal with a little minimalism this is a great cheap phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Noeth

customer_reviews.title: not for roaming
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't switch roaming to home very well. When going from home to roaming always have to accept prompt. Seems to often have trouble finding, connecting to signal.

customer_reviews.title: i worked great and i love it
customer_reviews.text: I was very please how quick my case and phone came and it was just as ordered. i worked great and i love it.

customer_reviews.text: It does everything I want and need, quickly. It is so far good quality. The only con I have is the picture quality isn't as good as I was hoping. Bhutan that might 20% User error.

customer_reviews.text: Came with an expired SIM card. T-Mobile said I would have to spend my own money on a new SIM card; very disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: The tiny space poses a challenge to installation of various Android Market files, but the phone itself is great.

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! Who needs iPhone! Battery life 18 hours amazing! Exceeding my expectations by far, and price is a steal! T-Mobile couldn't believe what paid for this phone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use phone with lots of good qualities

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Son Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Phone, $100 cheaper than the TMobile store. Son loves it. All we did was activate the Sim card which came with it and he was on his way. You can't insure it with TMobile though because it wasn't purchased through them but to replace an insured phone costs $130 anyways might as well just buy another phone. Hope this one lasts with my son, he is a phone killer. I bought an awesome case on here for like $4 it is very protective. Crosses fingers....
customer_reviews.author: C.L Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Phones work great. It was a nice upgrade for my parents ...
customer_reviews.text: It was everything as advertised. Phones work great. It was a nice upgrade for my parents from their flip phones. Only issue I had was they didn't come with micro SD cards but we were able to cut regular SD cards to fit in the slot.

customer_reviews.title: cant swim

customer_reviews.author: lois mymes

customer_reviews.title: Super Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Extensive versatility, very attractive, human intuitive, light, thin. It holds a charge with limited use for about 3+ days, which was very different from previous phone (HTC) with extended battery that would go 7-14 days on a charge. However, ti will fully charge in an hour or two, even if very low battery, whereas other phone required full overnight charge. Camera has much fewer pixels that similar phone and screen difficult to see in full AZ sun (as they all are). Otherwise, you can not do better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jawdoc

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this phone
customer_reviews.text: Really is a fine phone. I had a little problem with hearing as the sound was a little too sharp even though I am partially deaf so I reset the hearing compatibility setting and it sounds fine now. Really ticked with this phone. It shipped on time and works as expected. I recommend it. I like being able to shut down the bloat wear apps that I don't use too...it frees up the internal storage and keeps the phone working fast and accurately.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: 3 Weeks of Use Storage Error on Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is now giving Insufficient Memory Error and have not even had it 3 WEEKS!!!!! I bought a SD card and even factory Reset it but the storage error remains I cannot have more than 100 photos or 1 app on this phone Pretty much can only use it to Call and Text My emails cannot be synced either due to Storage space error would like to return this and get a refund or a device that is Functioning!!!! Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try the best phone for me and for you too
customer_reviews.text: Skateboy918 sold me a very good LGPhone and I'm very pleased with the product. Thanks lot
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: The phone fail to charged.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this LG Optimus F6 from different seller. Both had problem with the charger. Phones fail to charged in less than a year. Other than that, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: suryani gan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone other than the 4 gb memory limitation which ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone other than the 4 gb memory limitation which can be partially overcome with the microsd. Overall I'm very happy with this snappy little phone, and i've heard there still might be a kitkat update. I'm surprised more people aren't talking about it since it has similar specs to the moto g at a much lower price. I'd definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marek Gruca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its kind of mid range with a pretty good battery.

customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this phone. It is better than I expected!

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: Vary bright screen. Good sound. Fast. 4g lye. Better than the newer lg loan by fare.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i have t-mobile prepaid. the sim is a regular size, and t-mobile changed it for free.then i changed to GOSMART. THE BATTERY AND PHONE WORKED JUST ONE YEAR AND SIX MONTHS.
customer_reviews.author: Mantashoff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal got one for my son then grabbed onr for myself
customer_reviews.author: William Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: First time Droid user
customer_reviews.text: So far SOOoo good! It does fit with my lifestyle.. It serves what I only need from a Smartphone. I transitioned from Blackberry to Android for the 1st time in 6 years! Had no technical difficulty in setting up the phone. Only had few downside with a number of its default programs. Maybe Droid should wean their sweet partnership with Google and offer apps NOT from Google!!!! Speedy processor otherwise. Reasonably-priced -Made in China- I suppose every device now are made there, SCOFFS! Very IMPRESSED by the Fast delivery - more impressed that it was delivered Sunday! Thought they were trying to pull some kind of magic when the posted guaranteed delivery will be on a Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: Millet Ybanez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to transfer everything to the phone, easy to navigate, & is overall great. Only issue was the minimal amount of internal storage. With an added sd card, that was resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Quitta

customer_reviews.title: One Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. Im transitioning from a galaxy cause i was having issues with it so it's much different. However, this optimus has many many features that my Galaxy did not have or any phone I've had and i really enjoy those features...the memory in the phone is extremely low but i don't download many apps anyway so it works for me. I found that having the clean-sweep helps with removing useless junk and that alone provides space. Overall the price of the phone and the pros about it outweighs the cons. "In my opinion"
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Pollard

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great product got it in 2 days was able to track it. Just the phone i was looking for coming from a dell venue pro.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jab

customer_reviews.title: It was metropcs phone
customer_reviews.text: When I chose to buy this phone, I believed it was a T-Mobile phone. However, when the package arrived and I opened it I discovered it was the metropcs phone. I had gone through 2 different T-Mobile stores to activate my phone because it was not T-Mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ester

product_meta.title: LG Optimus F6 4GB Android 4G LTE Smartphone - T-Mobile
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

The LG Optimus F6 is an Android-powered smartphone with a 4.5 inch 950x540 touchscreen display and 5 megapixel camera with LED flash and Full HD Video Recording. This device comes equipped with 4 GB internal memory, with a microSD slot for up to 32 GB additional memory. The Optimus F6 allows for 4G LTE connectivity. Browse the internet, download apps, and connect with friends on this Android-powered device. This smartphone is also equipped with quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use. 

This device may require a data plan for activation. Please contact your cellular provider for details.
feature_bullets: The LG Optimus F6 is an Android-powered smartphone with a 4.5 inch 950x540 touchscreen display and 5 megapixel camera with LED flash and Full HD Video Recording
This device comes equipped with 4GB internal memory, with a microSD slot for up to 32GB additional memory
The Optimus F6 allows for 4G LTE connectivity. Browse the internet, download apps, and connect with friends on this Android-powered device
This smartphone is also equipped with quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
